short_summary: The purpose is to procure Dell N4032 network switches to lifecycle our existing Dell network infrastructure. This includes replacing the workable Dell switches with new Dell N4032 switches to maintain compatibility, interoperability and interchangeability with current design.
description: The requirement is to acquire the equipment and specified six Dell N4032 network switches to work with the current design. Please note that Justice Canada plans to acquire this equipment to ensure compatibility with our current equipment and environment. The equipment must be compatible, reliable, and able to work under stressful conditions, such as cooling failures, as these occasion have happened before. Please submit all required Supply Chain Security Information of any proposed equivalent products. RFQ Submissions must be sent via P2PSSC.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement: Dell Products or Equivalent 
#### Solicitation Number: BPM019440/23660
#### Solicitation Title: Dell Products or equivalent
#### Closing Date: 2023-09-12T15:00:00
#### Solicitation Type: Request for Proposal 
#### Solicitation Category: Goods 

Shared Services Canada intends to acquire six Dell N4032 network switches to replace the existing three pairs of switches that currently service iSCSI storage backend on three separate environments. The specified switches have been selected for their reliability and compatibility with existing equipment. Suppliers who wish to propose equivalent products are advised to carefully review SSC’s Standard Instructions, specifically the “Evaluation Procedures for Proposed Equivalent Products” section, in order to ensure compliance with the evaluation criteria.
 
The following documents have been attached as an appendix to this solicitation:
* Contract Document with terms and conditions
* Specification Sheet for Dell N4032 network switches
* Environmental Considerations Document
